Title: At the Codfish Ball
Plot: Don is honored at a banquet for the American Cancer Society, but finds his professional reputation has been damaged. Sally lends a hand to a relative. Megan's parents come to visit from Canada.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Talia Balsam, Julia Ormond, Ronald Guttman, Charlie Hofheimer, Ben Feldman, Myra Turley, Pamela Dunlap, Ray Wise, John Sloman, Robin Pearson Rose, Larisa Oleynik, Marten Holden Weiner
